30
Data Access and Integration
•
Gather data from different and 
distributed sources
•
Scientists/researchers make 
queries to different data 
sources
•
DAI system distributes the 
queries
•
DAI system integrates and 
process the results to form the 
requested data
•
The data is processed as the 
user demanded
